Package com.google.code.rees.scope.conversation.configuration

Interface Summary
ConversationArbitrator This class is used by a ConversationConfigurationProvider to determine which field and method members to associate with conversations.
ConversationConfigurationProvider This class is used by ConversationManagers to obtain the ConversationConfigurations for a given action/controller class
 

Class Summary
ConversationConfiguration This class is used to cache the fields and action IDs for a single class for a single conversation.
DefaultConversationArbitrator The default implementation of ConversationArbitrator
DefaultConversationConfigurationProvider The default implementation of ConversationConfigurationProvider
